title: Avenge the Drowned
content:
Make sure he's not knocked down and stay near him, when the battle end. This will start the quest ending dialog with Red. The mermaids conspire with the Sahuagin to scam the Sailors of their money, you can find them working together in the back of the cave beneath the temple.
